entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
